msbt.message: Something woke me up early today.I decided to just roll with it and get my day started ahead of time.
Did you ever wake up earlier than usual for no reason?That happened to me today I'm making the most of it, with a nice early morning stroll.
So this is what early-morning is likeI guess the early really does get the worm, ! Glad I was awake to experience this.
Surprised to see me walking around the island at this time of night?Even I have my sleepless nights.
I was having trouble falling asleep, so I came out for a late-night stroll.I'm hoping the exercise tires me out.
I just couldn't seem to fall asleep tonight, for whatever reason.I figured I'd get some nighttime air, since I was awake anyway.
